item.description:
FREE ADVANCED SCREENING

LIVE FREE OR DIE
March 28th @ 7pm
Regal Fenway 13
E-mail: advanced.screening@g mail.com for tickets

A comedy from the writers of Seinfeld set in New Hampshire, LIVE FREE OR DIE will open in theaters March 30th. Both of the writter/directors, as well as two of the actors, Paul Schneider (The Family Stone & Elizabethtown ) and Aaron Stanford (The Hills Have Eyes & X-Men: The Last Stand) will be in attendance for a question and answer session after the showing.
item.name: Live Free or Die Screening
